```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library("collapsibleTree")
library("readxl")
```

Assessment decision tree for tool selection based on answer types. Select the item type you want to use and find out what kind of assessment application to use.

```{r}
question.type <- c("Multibple choice", "Multibple answer", "Numeric", "Text")
options <- c("a","b","c")

text         <- "Text"
text.options <- c("Single word","One Paragraph", "Two Paragraphs", "Page")
expand.grid(text, text.options)

assessment.tree <- expand.grid(question.type, options)

read_excel("assessment_tree.xlsx")

# assessment.tree <- read_excel("assessment_tree.xlsx")

collapsibleTree(
  assessment.tree,
  hierarchy = c("Var1", "Var2"),
  width = 800
)
```
